django-calaccess-campaign-finance
=======================
A simple Django app to build campaign finance data from the cal access database. It is reliant on `django-calaccess-campaign-finance <https://github.com/california-civic-data-coalition/django-calaccess-campaign-finance>`_

A simple Django app to download, extract and load the
`CAL-ACCESS <http://www.sos.ca.gov/prd/cal-access/>`_ campaign finance and lobbying activity database.

Documentation
-------------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   howtouseit
   managementcommands
   models
   howtocontribute

* Issues: `https://github.com/california-civic-data-coalition/django-calaccess-campaign-finance/issues <https://github.com/california-civic-data-coalition/django-calaccess-campaign-finance/issues>`_
* Packaging: `https://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-calaccess-campaign-finance <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-calaccess-campaign-finance>`_
